short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TextCopier + is a Chrome extension that allows you to copy text from any website that does not allow text selection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 TextCopier +: Break Free from Text Restrictions! 🚀

Ever found yourself frustrated by websites that block your ability to copy text? Say goodbye to those restrictions with TextCopier +, your ultimate Chrome extension for seamless text copying!

🔗 Copy Text Anywhere:
TextCopier + empowers you to copy text from any website, even those notorious for preventing text selection. No more limitations—enjoy the freedom to grab the content you need effortlessly!

🌐 Universal Compatibility:
Whether it's a news article, blog post, or any text-heavy webpage, TextCopier + works seamlessly across the internet. Copying text has never been this convenient!

🛡️ Protect Your Right to Copy:
Unleash the power to copy where it was once restricted. TextCopier + is your shield against text-selecting barriers, ensuring you have control over the information you want.

👩‍💻 Developer's Note:
We've worked hard to make TextCopier + a reliable companion for your web-browsing experience. Enjoy the convenience of copying text hassle-free!

🚫 No More Limits, Only Freedom:
Don't let websites dictate what you can or cannot copy. Install TextCopier + now and break free from text selection constraints!

🌟 Why TextCopier +?

Universal Text Copying: Copy text from any website.
Effortless Installation: Easy setup, instant results.
Developer Support: Regular updates for optimal performance.
🚀 Ready to Experience Text Freedom? Install TextCopier + Today!
